sections.text: Any damage to the land of the state, in addition to the value of the land purchased, shall be assessed and included in the amount to be paid the state.SourceLaws 1943, c. 160, ยง 2, p. 574;R.S.1943, ยง 72-226.

72-226.Condemnation proceedings; damage to state-owned land; assessment.

Any damage to the land of the state, in addition to the value of the land purchased, shall be assessed and included in the amount to be paid the state.

SourceLaws 1943, c. 160, ยง 2, p. 574;R.S.1943, ยง 72-226.
